roleset.name: expelling gas
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, fart.01. Corresponds to VNcls hiccup-40.1.1

example.name: arg1
example.text: And your other post about going out in public and farting a loud one so many others can hear you, and then watching all the laughter, is so asinine.
example.arg: so many others can hear you
